sourcesContent:
import GetWidthOfComponent from './GetWidthOfComponent' import React, { Component, useState, useEffect } from 'react' import _Header from '../SecondaryComponents/Desktop/_Header' import _NavigationItems from '../SecondaryComponents/Desktop/_NavigationItems' import _MovieGenres from '../SecondaryComponents/Desktop/_MovieGenres' import { Button, Container, Menu, Responsive, Segment, Visibility, Grid, Divider, Image, Header, Search, Icon, Dropdown, Label } from 'semantic-ui-react' import _BrowseCategories from '../SecondaryComponents/Desktop/_BrowseCategories' const DesktopComponent = ({ children }) => { const [fixedMenu, setFixedMenu] = useState(false); const [startDate, setStartDate] = useState(new Date()); const [hovered, setHovered] = useState(false); const OnMouseHovered = () => { setHovered(true); } const OnMouseOut = () => { setHovered(false); } const FixedMenu = () => { setFixedMenu(!fixedMenu) } return ( FixedMenu()} onBottomPassedReverse={() => FixedMenu()}> <_Header/> <_NavigationItems/> <_BrowseCategories/> <_MovieGenres/>
{children} ) } export default DesktopComponent;
